options.name: WaveNoise
options.comments: Create a type of wave noise
code: mix(mix(n000, n100, a.x), mix(n010, n110, a.x), a.y),
mix(mix(n001, n101, a.x), mix(n011, n111, a.x), a.y), a.z);
return vec3(gnoise(p, seed.x), gnoise(p, seed.y), gnoise(p, seed.z));
void waveNoise(vec3 p, float t, out vec3 result)

options.name: Hexagon
code: vec4 hexCenter = round(vec4(uv, uv - vec2(.5, 1.)) / s.xyxy);
vec4 offset = vec4(uv - hexCenter.xy * s, uv - (hexCenter.zw + .5) * s);
return dot(offset.xy, offset.xy) < dot(offset.zw, offset.zw) ? vec4(offset.xy, hexCenter.xy) : vec4(offset.zw, hexCenter.zw);
void hexagon(in vec2 uv, out float result )
